title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing incense in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing incense in a dream Incense in a dream is a source of abundant livelihood, and the pleasant smell of incense is evidence of the arrival of happy news and good fame. Perhaps seeing incense in a dream reflects peace and good relationships. Also, dream scholars consider incense in a dream to be a success in business and a prestigious job obtained by the dreamer by the command of God. Interpretation of seeing incense in a dream by Ibn Sirin If one sees a dream of incense or smells it, it means that good things have come and hopes are beyond reach. Incense denotes The traveler returns and loses something. Whoever sees himself in a dream being fumigated indicates that good morals and good news will come. Fumigating the sick person in a dream is a cure and may indicate the end of rivalry between the dreamer and his family. Seeing black incense in a dream reflects for Mahmoud great happiness and joy, and perhaps the disappearance of tension. And worrying about God’s command. A man who smokes his house in a dream is evidence of a good wife who brings him a lot of goodness. The appearance of incense in the dreamer’s house and an imminent pregnancy could give birth to a married man who has a prominent position among people. Interpretation of a dream about incense for a single girl: If you dream that you saw incense in a dream This indicates that you are lucky and have achieved the dreams and desires that you pursued in the previous period. If you dream that you inhaled the scent of incense, this indicates that many good things will come to your life soon. If you think that it does not stick to incense, this indicates the good reputation that This girl enjoys it. Seeing incense in a married woman’s dream. A married woman seeing incense in a dream indicates the abundant blessing and abundance that she will receive in the future, and perhaps incense and the appearance of its scent are evidence of the stability of the family and the happy life that God commands. Incense in a dream is a good life and noble morals, and seeing Incense in a dream is a solution to the problems and fears of a woman and her husband, and the smell of incense can foretell an imminent pregnancy if God wants it. Incense in a wife’s dream fulfills the ambitions and aspirations she seeks and she can find an excellent job. Interpretation of seeing incense in a dream for a pregnant woman Incense in a pregnant woman’s dream reflects good morals And the justice of the husband and the stability of marital life. Incense can symbolize the dream of a pregnant woman, the woman’s incense with her husband, a happy life and the resolution of problems between them. The smell of incense in a dream is a source of good and abundant livelihood, and perhaps a distinctive job for the husband. Interpretation of a married man seeing incense in a dream. Seeing incense in The dream is evidence of the dreamer’s good morals and good qualities among people. The man in the dream is evaporated with a new job and great happiness for the husband with his wife. If the man sees an incense burner in a dream and smells the smell of incense emanating from it, then this vision indicates a good reputation and may indicate happiness and joy in arriving at the dreamer’s home. Buying incense in a dream: Seeing incense in a dream and taking it for men and women is a sign of good morals, and the smell of incense can express the husband’s generosity with his wife and his happy life. A wife who fumes from her husband in a dream is

title: Fear of cats in a dream

preview.html: But seeing fear of cats is one of the visions that we should not ignore, as it symbolizes more than one interpretation, and this is what we discussed on the website gptafser.com/, so follow us to learn more. Interpretation of seeing fear of cats in a dream for a single girl: If a single girl sees a group of cats surrounding her and becomes afraid Among them. He appears as a kind and innocent person, but sometimes he is a naive person who is exploited by everyone. Can a single woman see many cats surrounding her and make her unable to move and afraid of them? The dream is interpreted by negative thoughts that dominate her thinking about something important to her and is reflected in Her dreams. The interpretation of the vision varies. An unmarried woman sees that a white cat is chasing her, even if the dreamer feels afraid. The vision may mean that he will marry the person he desires, or that he will reach a goal that he was pursuing after he considered it impossible. But if the girl sees a lot Of cats while she was sleeping in her house, in her room, or on her bed, and she chased them away because she was afraid of them. Good news for the end of her suffering and finding solutions to the problems that she suffers from and that bother her, or the end of a relationship that caused her psychological harm. And if a girl sees in her dream that her friend or fiancé gave her cats But she felt afraid of them inside. One of the signs that indicate that this person is conspiring against her is that he shows her love and affection but hides the deception inside her. See also: Interpretation of seeing cats in a dream in detail. Interpretation of seeing fear of cats in a dream for a married woman. If the woman dreams of cats and is more afraid of them. From time to time, she should be careful and cautious. Because the vision indicates a close friend who is deceiving her. You will harm her in her home if you are not very careful. If a married woman feels afraid of cats during her sleep, but the fear does not prevent her from taking them out of her home courageously. The dream shows courage The dreamer is dealing with someone who is trying to sabotage her married life. If a woman sees beautiful cats in different colors in her dream, but she is afraid of them and drives them out of her house. This indicates the viewer’s inability to distinguish between what is real and what is wrong with her, which prompts her to act randomly. Fear of a white cat that looks good on a married woman in a dream. The cat here means a woman who can be a friend or lover to her husband who is close to him, and he is, so one should pay attention to this woman. Fear of cats in a married woman’s dream, especially if It was a dirty black cat that looked scary. The black cat in this vision symbolizes the betrayal of the husband. And the problems that will arise that will lead to divorce. Interpretation of the fear of cats in a dream for a man and its meaning. If a man sees his wife in a dream in the form of a cat chasing him, trying to bite him, and he feels fear for her. This indicates His mistreatment of his wife, which leads to her explosion and bringing more of it. The feeling of fear of seeing a black cat in a dream for a man is one of the warning visions of the fortuneteller. Which indicates his wife’s misbehavior and arrogance, and that she does not love him, and does not consider God in himself or in his children, and God The highest and most knowledgeable. As for if

title: The best 11+ comprehensive interpretation of seeing a peacock in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: We see the difference in interpretation on a case-by-case basis regarding the person who sees the peacock itself, or sees the peacock feathers or gives them to the pioneer, or eats its meat in a dream, and various other matters that we explain. In the following detailed way: Interpretation of seeing a peacock by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin sees a peacock in a dream as a sign of a man who leads women to immorality and abominations, just as if one sees a male peacock in his dream, then this is a sign of a strange man of foreign origin, the owner. Of prestige and money. As for the female peacock, it indicates that the dreamer will be blessed with an abundance of money. It can also indicate, if the dreamer is a man, that a beautiful, rich woman will enter his life, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of seeing a peacock for an unmarried woman. Seeing a peacock in a dream for an unmarried girl is a vision Good has many good connotations. But if she sees a peacock in her house in her dream, this means that she will meet someone with whom she has feelings, because a single girl who sees a peacock in a dream generally indicates good luck in life. It is also an indication of making a good decision in matters Her life.Interpretation of seeing a peacock for a married woman: When a married woman sees a peacock in a dream, this is a sign of good and happy news, especially if she sees herself playing with a peacock in a dream, as a peacock for a married woman indicates abundance of sustenance, progress, and advancement. And success in work is achieved by her husband, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about a peacock for a pregnant woman. A peacock in a pregnant woman’s dream is a good omen, as it indicates overcoming difficulties, healing from diseases, removing problems, and getting rid of worries. Interpretation of seeing a peacock for a person. If the dreamer is a man and sees a peacock wandering around his house, this is an omen. Good, because it indicates achieving success and achieving the desired goals on the emotional or professional level. Interpretation of peacock feathers in a dream Seeing human feathers in a dream is a praiseworthy vision because it indicates that the person will gain prestige and money or have influence and power, and it is also praiseworthy to see red or green feathers. Or colored in more than one color. As for black and yellow feathers, it is not good to see them, as the first indicates failure, bad luck, and hearing bad news, and the second indicates illness, distress, sadness, and worry, and God knows best. Anyone who has a vision and wants to explain it, we will take your comments at the bottom of the article via the site. We will give you an explanation as soon as possible

title: Interpretation of a dream about reading the Qur’an in a dream

preview.html: “O leaders, give me a fatwa regarding my dreams, if you are visions.” (43) Learn about the interpretation of the dream of reciting the Qur’an in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen and many dreams. Today's encyclopedia, we show you interpretations of reading the Holy Qur’an in a dream. Follow us. Interpretation of a dream about reading the Qur’an in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the Qur’an in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin is the most important imam of dream interpretation in the world. Seeing in a dream reading the Holy Qur’an the following: Seeing the Qur’an in a dream is considered a good vision in general and has many good connotations. Reading the Holy Qur’an in a dream symbolizes sustenance and abundance of goodness for the one who sees it. If someone sees the Qur’an in a dream, this indicates What distinguishes that person is his purity. Just touch the purified one. But if he sees in a dream that he is reading the Qur’an from the Qur’an to the sick person; This symbolizes getting rid of all problems and difficulties in the dreamer’s life, and indicates recovery from illness. Seeing the purchase of the Qur’an in a dream portends an abundance of goodness, sustenance blessed by God Almighty for the pioneer, and an increase in money. If a person sees in his dream that he is buying a large-sized Qur’an. This indicates that he will advance in his field of work. Seeing the Qur’an given to children in a dream symbolizes protecting children from all evil. Seeing a library full of Qur’ans. This indicates that the dreamer has many good deeds. Interpretation of reading the Qur’an in a dream for a single woman: Ibn Shaheen believes that seeing an unmarried girl in her dream reading the Holy Qur’an is a praiseworthy vision that symbolizes the approach of God Almighty and the honor of that girl. If a poor, unmarried girl dreams that she reading Quran. This indicates that she will have a lot of money and food, and it also symbolizes that she will marry a wealthy young man who will soon obtain a position. Seeing listening to the Holy Quran in a dream. It symbolizes the closeness of repentance to this girl and her distance from sins. In addition, listening to the Holy Qur’an is a sign of alleviating all of life’s difficulties. If a committed girl sees herself reading the Holy Qur’an in her dream. This symbolizes the goodness of this girl. Seeing the recitation of the Holy Qur’an in the dream of an unmarried, unmarried girl who is far from God, expresses the extent of that girl’s desire to get closer to God Almighty, and shows the sincerity of her intention. And if the unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is opening the Qur’an Until you read the Holy Quran. This indicates the success that God Almighty has given her. Seeing a single girl reciting the Holy Qur’an indicates that God Almighty takes care of her with her disability, and that she will achieve what she aspires to. Even if the verses she memorizes are verses of heaven’s mercy and victory. This symbolizes God’s satisfaction with her, and that He - Glory be to Him - accepts her into Paradise. Reading the Qur’an in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman in her dream that she is reading the Holy Qur’an in a low voice. This indicates that she will become pregnant soon. A married woman sees in her dream that she is reading the Holy Quran out loud. This indicates that good news is coming. And if she sees that she is holding the Qur’an in her hands. This symbolizes getting rid of all manifestations of...

title: Interpretation of seeing a hill in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the view of the plateau through the website see roy2a.com. The word plateau is called the high and flat land that has a peak like mountains and hills and is surrounded by one or more cliffs. There are many different forms of plateaus around the world, such as seeing a plateau in a dream. It contains many clues about the real life of the pioneer, which we will explain today through this article by presenting the most important interpretations given by the great dream interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and the devoted Imam for various people such as single and married women. And for men, please follow us. Interpretation of seeing a hill in a dream. Seeing yourself sitting on a hill in a dream is an indication that the dreamer has achieved an important position or a job promotion. Seeing a hill in a dream means the dreamer’s peak and good reputation in his life. Living on a hill in a dream is an indication that the dreamer is heading towards whoever he is. Higher than him in his affairs. Interpretation of seeing a plateau in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a plateau in a dream according to Ibn Sirin refers to the man responsible for rule, authority, or the sheikh of the tribe. Walking over a hill in a dream is an indication of the dreamer’s survival from falling into great trouble. Seeing a plateau in a dream indicates what he is planning. The dreamer of the future. Seeing a dream that you are climbing a hill means that the fortuneteller will obtain whatever positions and knowledge he desires. As for seeing a speech delivered from a hill in a dream? Sign that the dreamer will reach the highest positions in the state. Seeing falling from a high hill indicates the fortuneteller’s sorrows in his life or his illness. Living on a high hill in a dream indicates that the fortuneteller will be affected by diet, money, and abundance among his people. Seeing a plateau in a dream indicates high appreciation, obtaining prestigious positions, promotion at work, money, and status. Interpretation of seeing a hill in a dream for a single woman. Seeing climbing to reach the top of the hill indicates a dream about a person seeking to fulfill her desires. And her ambitions in life. Reaching the top of the hill in one dream is an indication that he has achieved what he wants and is striving for. Sitting on the hill in one dream is a sign that you will achieve what you want, but after wasting a lot of time, energy and effort. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing sheep. Interpretation of seeing sheep. Interpretation of seeing The deadInterpretation of seeing currencyInterpretation of seeing mangoInterpretation of seeing peachesInterpretation of a dream of chokingInterpretation of a vision about potatoesInterpretation of a vision of watermelonInterpretation of seeing a hill in a dream for a married womanSeeing a plateau in a dream indicates that she is a married womanComfort and happiness that will come to her life. Seeing going down the hill for a married womanUnfavorable visions indicate anxiety, insomnia, and illness. Climbing a hill in a married woman’s dream achieves what he wants and strives for. Interpretation of seeing a hill in a dream for a man. Seeing a plateau in a man’s dream for a single person indicates his marriage to a woman of beauty and origin. If a person sees in a dream that he is calling him from the top of a hill, Promotion Log in. Seeing walking on a plateau In a man's dream, he will be saved from the evil of his life. A man seeing that his house is on a hill is a sign that a huge diet is coming to him. A house on a hill in a patient's dream is a sign of the coming of his recovery.

title: Interpretation of a blow to the face in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of hitting the face in a dream for a single girl, married, pregnant, divorced, for a man. If I dream of a man hitting me in the face and hitting the child in the eye with a palm or a slap or with the pen of Ibn Sirin and others. Interpretation of hitting the face in a dream: Whoever sees as if someone is hitting him in the face in a dream, then this is an action. Good for him makes him famous or well-known. Hitting a woman in the face for the love and adoration inside her, and hitting a child in the face is nourishment and kindness. Punching a man in the face was of the highest rank and status. If it hit the face and hit the eye, this indicates the child’s guidance and righteousness. Hitting has benefits in the case of the abuser and the attacked, indicating guidance and benefit. The interest between the two parties is a role model. A strike with the palm or hand indicates that the dreamer benefited from the strike. It can be a common action that brings a lot of money or collects money without effort. Hitting the face in a dream is a sign of good and happy news. A hit in the face is a sign of changes in life for the viewer. Whoever sees in a dream that he hits the face and gets slapped, he will get sick. Interpretation of a hit On the face in a dream Being punched in the face in a dream is a sign of major changes in the dreamer’s life. Whoever sees that someone hits him in the face at work in a dream, the dream indicates that there is someone to help him. A single girl sees someone hitting her in the face in a dream. The vision indicates that she She will suffer from injustice at work or in the family. Whoever sees himself punching someone in the face in a dream, the dream shows the consequences of disobedience, sins, and taboos. If an unmarried woman dreams that her mother or father is hitting her in the face, the dream indicates that there is a moral person who will give her Marriage, but he will not agree to this engagement. If a married woman dreams that someone is hitting her in the face, then the dream is a sign of the fulfillment of desires and the completion of problems and difficulties she has faced in her life. A pregnant woman who sees her husband slapping her in the face in a dream is good news that she She will have a large income and a large living, and she will live a happy life with her husband. Whoever sees that someone hits him in the face and the hit reaches the eye in the dream, the dream indicates that this person is righteous and helps others and works to guide them. Interpretation of a hit on the cheek in a dreamIf a man sees that someone What hits him on the cheek in a dream, the dream indicates that the dreamer is a person who works to help people. A pregnant woman who sees her husband hitting her on the cheek in a dream indicates that she will give birth to a girl. A divorced woman who sees someone knocking her on her knees, the dream indicates the imminent arrival of good deeds and the imminent appearance of changes. Positivity, God willing. An unmarried girl who sees herself slapping herself on the cheek in a dream, the dream indicates that there is someone who wants to marry her, but she will reject this husband. Interpretation of hitting someone in a dream: Whoever sees that he is punching someone in the face in a dream, the vision indicates To the fact that the dreamer is a real person who does good and helps people. title: Interpretation of seeing a thief in a dream in different situations

preview.html: Here is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a thief in a dream. The religion of Islam prohibits theft and the illegal acquisition of things or money. Whoever actually pursues theft, even if he is poor, is an outcast in this world and religion because he angers God Almighty and harms others by taking his right to someone else. Justification.Seeing a thief or robber causes many feelings of fear, anger and disgust in reality, but what about seeing him in a dream? This is what you will know in “Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a thief in a dream” from the encyclopedia website. A thief in a dream. The meaning of seeing a thief in a dream. Ibn Sirin explained that whoever dreams that a thief enters his house and tries to rob him in order to succeed and take his money, then this indicates the death of one of the members of that house. But if he does not The thief can steal it, as this is evidence that a member of the house is close to death, but God Almighty protects him from death with His power, while seeing the thief killed indicates liberation from it. Worries and recovery from illness. Seeing theft in a dream may indicate the presence of some deceitful and immoral people in the dreamer’s life. Seeing carpets being stolen in a dream means that the dreamer is facing a serious financial crisis. And whoever sees a thief stealing from his dining room indicates the illness of his wife, such as seeing a thief He steals gold, feels sad, and cries intensely, as this is a sign of the death of one of his relatives, and God knows best. And if someone sees in a dream a thief stealing papers from his bag, this indicates the loss of many important opportunities in his life, so he must avoid that and take care of his business affairs for the next period of his grain. In seeing a thief stealing keys, this is an indication that the dreamer will be exposed to some problems and difficulties in the coming days. Theft in a man’s dream. If he sees a thief entering his house and there is a sick person, this is a sign of the sick person’s recovery and recovery of his health. And whoever sees in his dream that he has become a thief and begun to Stealing things is a sign that his circumstances will change for the better and he will feel happy in his life in the near future. Whoever is single and sees a thief stealing his house, this indicates that he gets rid of the problems he is going through with ease. And whoever sees a thief stealing something from his pocket, this indicates that Someone has wronged him in his absence and that God will reveal this person to him soon. Interpretation of a thief who sees an unmarried woman in a dream: A single woman’s vision of someone entering her father’s house indicates that there is someone who wants to marry her soon, and whoever sees in her dream a thief stealing one of her personal possessions, then this It is a sign that someone is trying to get close to her and win her affection, but she meets him with denial and turns away from him. Anyone who sees herself chasing a thief and trying to hide him will be an indication that she has gotten rid of a difficult issue and a major problem in her life. And whoever sees in her dream a thief stealing her food or money, then this It indicates that she will hear happy news in the near future, and this vision could be good news for her with a good husband. Seeing a thief stealing unmarried women’s clothes indicates that her condition will change for the better and her sadness will change to happiness and joy. Interpretation of a dream about a thief in the house and he did not steal anything. A vision A thief was inside the house, but he did not steal from Moh

title: Interpretation of the dream of the name Salman in a dream includes the correct interpretations

preview.html: Our next article in the encyclopedia is about the interpretation of the name Salman in a dream. It is a name that includes his majesty and his lofty cause, as it means surrender, obedient, and it also means devoid of faults and shortcomings, and Muslims have given it to their children because of their intense love for the great. Comrade Salman Al-Farisi, when one sees him in a dream, it is usually one of the praiseworthy visions that convey good news to its owners and make them happy. Dream interpretation scholars such as the scholar and jurist Ibn Sirin, Imam Ibn Shaheen, Al-Nabulsi and others have told us that seeing names in a dream carries good or bad meanings for the dreamer, and this depends on On the meaning of the name. In the face of optimism and the desire to find an explanation for his future that gives him peace and happiness, we show you the consequences of seeing him in a dream in detail in the following paragraphs. Interpretation of the name Salman in a dream Seeing him in a dream means that good and great sustenance will come to the dreamer in the coming period, because this goodness is linked to his professional and personal life, and God I know. It indicates the good condition and personality of the dreamer, and that he is a religious person with good conduct and behavior among those around him. Good news in the response to the prayers that the dreamer used to supplicate to God Almighty a lot, and God accepts his supplication and fulfills his desire by His command. His vision is considered one of the most worthy visions. With praise that brings goodness and pleasure to the pioneer. Seeing it written in a dream is a sign that the dreamer is going through a new experience in his life from which he will reap goodness, gain, and change his situation for the better. The name in a dream is Ibn SirinIbn Sirin, a great follower, a jurist in the science of hadith and interpretation, and a pioneer in the science of interpretation. Dreams. God is good and God knows best. The dreamer’s vision of one of the names that have beautiful meanings such as faith, sincerity, majesty, generous, interpretation according to the meaning, the meaning is beautiful, the dream is praiseworthy, and if the meaning is not good, then the dream is a bad omen for the monarch according to the meaning and God knows best. Vision The name Salman in a dream indicates the dreamer’s safety from an evil that he may be exposed to, but God protected him and saved him from it. Therefore, we have reached the end of our article in which we presented the interpretation of the name Salman in a dream for the single, married, pregnant, male and all cases on the basis of which the dream can be seen, Interpretation scholars stated in their efforts to clarify the interpretation of everything that the dreamer may see during his sleep, but there must be knowledge and complete certainty that these interpretations are only personal interpretations that accept what is right as well as tolerate what is wrong, and the interpretation of the dream. About the brother, you can enter through the direct application for dream interpretation.

Seeing yourself becoming a Jew can mean that you are committing sins and that God Higher and more familiar, as it may express negligence in religious duties. God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees the Jews, it may be a sign that the dreamer has been warned to repent, and God knows the unseen. When you see the Jews, it may be a sign of stinginess in dealings, and God knows the unseen. However, seeing the ruqyah in a dream can be evidence of healing, God willing. When you see the ruqyah, it is evidence of security, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of seeing marriage in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a wedding in a dream Marriage is a sacred bond between two people in order to form a happy family and achieve stability in life. God Almighty created it for a feeling of fullness and comfort. Interpretation scholars have mentioned many connotations and interpretations of seeing a wedding in a dream, and we will explain them in some detail through the following lines of the article. Seeing a wedding in a dream There are many interpretations of jurists regarding seeing a wedding in a dream, the most important of which are the following: If you see a wedding in a dream, this A sign of the positive transformation that will soon occur in your life and the happiness that you will feel. If one is experiencing a difficult crisis at work these days, the dream of marriage symbolizes relief from distress and obtaining a better professional opportunity in the coming period. When a knowledge seeker dreams of marrying a familiar woman To him, this is a sign of his superiority over his peers and obtaining the highest grades. If an unmarried girl sees a wedding during her sleep, this proves that a good young man will soon offer her to marry him and she will live a happy life without worries and problems. Seeing marriage in a dream according to Ibn Sirin, mentioned by the great scholar Muhammad ibn Sherine - may God have mercy on him - in his interpretation of seeing a wedding in a dream: Seeing a wedding in a dream symbolizes the blessing of sustenance and the abundance of goodness in the dreamer’s path. If you are already unemployed, then dreaming of marriage indicates that God - Glory be to Him - will give you a prestigious job with an income. Rewarding in the coming days. If an unmarried young man sees during his sleep that he is marrying a beautiful woman, this is a sign that he will soon marry a girl with good morals and religion. In the event that the dreamer is actually married in reality and sees in a dream that he is marrying a woman he does not know, this will To get pregnant soon, God willing, as well as to be in love with his partner and do whatever he wants. Through his hand to make her happy. If you are going through a financial crisis at this time in your life and dream of marriage, this indicates that you have earned a lot of money through inheritance or lucrative work. Seeing marriage in a single woman’s dreamIf a girl dreams of marriage, this means her close relationship with a young man Saleh Taqi treats her kindly and always strives to provide her with a comfortable and comfortable life. If an unmarried woman sees in a dream that she is marrying a strange man, this is a sign of her failure and failure in some aspects of her life in the coming period, but she should not despair and try again until he writes God bless him and grant him success. If a girl gets engaged in a dream and sees her marriage ceremony and her partner does not attend, this is a sign of her separation from the young man she is engaged to in reality. When an unmarried girl dreams of marriage and in reality she suffers from grief or sadness, this indicates that God will comfort her and give her happiness and peace of mind. If an unmarried woman marries her lover while she is sleeping, this proves that she will soon obtain an important position in her work, which will greatly improve her social status. What is the interpretation of a dream about marrying an unmarried brother? A brother’s marriage to his sister is actually forbidden because the Lord - Almighty - He forbade mating, so Ibn explained
